languages.text: "В этом гнезде безбожников, язычников и мерзейших душ, ты хотел{mf||а} сказать? Что же, Футфол — это первая и последняя стоянка Простора Коронус. Сюда прибывают те, кто лишь в начале своего пути, сюда же, влача израненные кровоточащие души, возвращаются те, кто в самом его конце. Я принимаю и тех, и других, чтобы они могли честно взглянуть на свои грехи".

traits.locale_text: "В этом гнезде безбожников, язычников и мерзейших душ, ты хотел{mf||а} сказать? Что же, Футфол — это первая и последняя стоянка Простора Коронус. Сюда прибывают те, кто лишь в начале своего пути, сюда же, влача израненные кровоточащие души, возвращаются те, кто в самом его конце. Я принимаю и тех, и других, чтобы они могли честно взглянуть на свои грехи".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "What am I doing in this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you mean to say? Well, Footfall is the first and last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."
languages.original_text: "В этом гнезде безбожников, язычников и мерзейших душ, ты хотел{mf||а} сказать? Что же, Футфол — это первая и последняя стоянка Простора Коронус. Сюда прибывают те, кто лишь в начале своего пути, сюда же, влача израненные кровоточащие души, возвращаются те, кто в самом его конце. Я принимаю и тех, и других, чтобы они могли честно взглянуть на свои грехи".

traits.locale_text: "In this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you meant to say? Well, Footfall is the first and the last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and this is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I accept both kinds so that they could honestly look at their sins."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “你是想问，我在这个充满了亵渎者、异端分子与最卑鄙的灵魂的巢穴里做些什么，是吗？这么说吧，落脚港是来到科罗努斯扩区的第一站，也是最后一站。它是那些刚刚开始踏上旅途的人们的起点，也是那些抵达终点的人返回的地方。那些人的灵魂受了伤，鲜血淋漓。这两种人我都会接纳，这样一来，他们就可以用诚实的目光，看着他们自己的罪恶。”
languages.original_text: "What am I doing in this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you mean to say? Well, Footfall is the first and last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."

traits.locale_text: “你是想问，我在这个充满了亵渎者、异教徒与最卑鄙的灵魂的巢穴里做些什么，是吗？这么说吧，落脚港是来到科罗努斯扩区的第一站，也是最后一站。它是那些刚刚开始踏上旅途的人们的起点，也是那些抵达终点的人返回的地方。那些人的灵魂受了伤，鲜血淋漓。这两种人我都会接纳，这样一来，他们就可以用诚实的目光，看着他们自己的罪恶。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «¿Quiere saber qué hago en esta guarida de blasfemos, paganos y almas viles? Paso es la primera y última parada de la Extensión de Koronus. Es el destino de aquellos que acaban de iniciar su camino y el de las almas en duelo que están a punto de terminarlo. Yo acojo a ambos para esclarecer sus impurezas de la manera más honesta».
languages.original_text: "What am I doing in this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you mean to say? Well, Footfall is the first and last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quiere saber qué hago en esta guarida de blasfemos, paganos y almas viles? Paso es la primera y última parada de la Extensión de Koronus. Es el destino de aquellos que acaban de iniciar su camino y el de las almas en duelo que están a punto de terminarlo. Yo acojo a ambos para esclarecer sus pecados de la manera más honesta».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「この冒涜者、異教徒、卑劣な魂がまみれる巣窟で私が何をしているのか、ということでしょうか？まず、フットフォールはコロヌス・エクスパンスの始点であり終点です。道を歩み始めたばかりの者にとっては到着点であり、旅を終えた者が魂に傷を負い血を流しながら戻ってくる執着点でもあります。すべての者が己の不純さを正直に見つめることができるように、私は前者も後者も受け入れているのです」
languages.original_text: "What am I doing in this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you mean to say? Well, Footfall is the first and last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."

traits.locale_text: 「この冒涜者、異教徒、卑劣な魂がまみれる巣窟で私が何をしているのか、ということでしょうか？まず、フットフォールはコロヌス・エクスパンスの始点であり終点です。道を歩み始めたばかりの者にとっては到着点であり、旅を終えた者が魂に傷を負い血を流しながら戻ってくる執着点でもあります。すべての者が己の罪を正直に見つめることができるように、私は前者も後者も受け入れているのです」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Ihr wollt wissen, was ich in dieser Höhle voller Gotteslästerer, Heiden und verkommener Seelen mache? Nun, Footfall ist die erste und letzte Anlaufstelle in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Hier kommen sowohl jene an, die ihren Pfad gerade erst begonnen haben, als auch jene, die an dessen Ende hierher zurückkehren, mit verwundeten und blutenden Seelen. Ich schließe sie alle in meine Arme, auf dass sie einen ehrlichen Blick auf ihre Unreinheit werfen."
languages.original_text: "What am I doing in this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you mean to say? Well, Footfall is the first and last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt wissen, was ich in dieser Höhle voller Gotteslästerer, Heiden und verkommener Seelen mache? Nun, Footfall ist die erste und letzte Anlaufstelle in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Hier kommen sowohl jene an, die ihren Pfad gerade erst begonnen haben, als auch jene, die an dessen Ende hierher zurückkehren, mit verwundeten und blutenden Seelen. Ich schließe sie alle in meine Arme, auf dass sie einen ehrlichen Blick auf ihre Sünden werfen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Pourquoi suis-je dans cet antre de blasphémateurs, de païens et d'âmes ignobles, vous voulez dire ? Eh bien, Castel est à la fois la première et dernière halte des Étendues de Koronus. C'est le point d'arrivée de ceux qui entament leur voyage, comme c'est là que les personnes l'ayant terminé reviennent, l'âme blessée et en piteux état. J'accueille chacun sans distinction, pour permettre à tous de mieux comprendre leur impureté. »
languages.original_text: "What am I doing in this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you mean to say? Well, Footfall is the first and last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi suis-je dans cet antre de blasphémateurs, de païens et d'âmes ignobles, vous voulez dire ? Eh bien, Castel est à la fois la première et dernière halte des Étendues de Koronus. C'est le point d'arrivée de ceux qui entament leur voyage, comme c'est là que les personnes l'ayant terminé reviennent, l'âme blessée et en piteux état. J'accueille chacun sans distinction, pour permettre à tous de mieux comprendre leurs péchés. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Bu dinsizlerin, paganların ve en aşağılık ruhların yuvasında ne işim olduğunu mu soruyorsun? Binliman, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki ilk ve son duraktır. İnsanlar yolculuklarına buradan başlar, yolculuklarının sonundakiler de o yaralı ve kanayan ruhlarıyla buraya döner. Ben her ikisine de kucak açarım ki kendi safsızlıklarını içtenlikle görebilsinler."
languages.original_text: "What am I doing in this den of blasphemers, pagans, and the vilest of souls, you mean to say? Well, Footfall is the first and last stop in the Koronus Expanse. It is the point of arrival for those who have just started on their path, and it is also where those who are reaching its very end return, their souls wounded and bleeding. I embrace both the former and the latter, so that they may cast an honest eye over their impurity."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kâfir, dinsiz ve kötülük yuvasında ne yapıyorum demek istiyorsun? Eh, Binliman, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki ilk ve son duraktır. İnsanlar yolculuklarına buradan başlar, yolculuklarının en sonundakiler de o yaralı ve kanayan ruhlarıyla buraya döner. Ben her ikisine de kucak açarım ki kendi kirliliklerine dürüst gözlerle bakabilsinler."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
